Degree.comments: Candidate does not have a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology or equivalent.

Experience.comments: Candidate does not have 4+ years of professional experience in front-end web development or proven experience as Front End Developer in Fintech area.

TechnicalSkills.comments: Candidate has experience with React and Javascript, which are required technical skills.

Responsibilities.comments: Candidate has some relevant responsibilities, but may not have experience with all of the required responsibilities.

Certificates.comments: Candidate does not have any required certificates.

SoftSkills.comments: Candidate has good communication skills, which is a required soft skill.

SummaryComment: The candidate does not meet the degree and experience requirements, but has some relevant technical skills and soft skills.
